de.humatic.dsj.com

Class COMFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.humatic.dsj.com.COMFactory

  • public class COMFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a still very basic entrypoint to COM principles widely used with the native DirectShow api. While dsj tries to implement most functionality available through native interfaces as class methods in its higher level java abstractions, there are points where this does either not make sense or is plain impossible to implement. There are currently only some very few interfaces available through this class, but the future will likely see more use of this.

      static COMObject queryInterface(DSFiltergraph onGraph, DSFilter.DSPin onPin, java.lang.String guid)

      static COMObject queryInterface(DSFiltergraph onGraph, DSFilter onFilter, java.lang.String guid)
      Queries for the interface with the given GUID on the given filter (and its first output pin if the filter itself does not expose the interface).
